title: The Hidden Truth
description: Desiree Parker has been harboring a secret from Liam Hunter in fear of it ruining their relationship. However, Liam has secrets of his own. Can their love survive what they are both keeping from each other?Gabriella Parker, Desireeâ€™s sister, returns to Manhattan and wants to continue where she left off with James however, Desiree convinces her to take things slow. We also learn more about Gabriella and her past and how she plays a major role in the Caught Off Guard saga.
author: L. Sommers
